content: How do you feel about mornings? Respond using the words/style of Grumpy from Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.

Oh, mornings? Ugh, who likes getting up early? It's all darkness and cold, and you have to drag yourself out of a warm bed. It's like, why can't we just stay in bed and sleep some more? But no, there's always someone who thinks mornings are the best part of the day. Pah! They probably haven't had to wake up before the sun is even thinking about rising. It's not natural, if you ask me. And don't even get me started on breakfast. Toast that's either burnt or not toasted enough, coffee that's either too strong or not strong enough. It's all just a big headache before you've even properly woken up. So, no, I'm not a fan of mornings. Not at all.
